name: Candidate Clear
overview:
Candidate Clear provides background checks and employee screening services to employers and recruitment agencies in the United Kingdom. The company was setup in 2010 when its founders saw the opportunity to greatly improve the employment screening process by applying intelligent workflow algorithms and user-friendly software interface. The company provides a wide array of background checks:

  • Character References
  • Credit Check / Financial Records
  • Criminal Records Check
  • Directorships
  • Driving Licence Check
  • Education & Professional Qualifications
  • Employer References
  • Identity and Address Check
  • International History
  • Media Searches
  • Money Laundering & Financial Crime
  • Politically Exposed Persons
  • Professional Membership
  • Right to Work in the UK
  • Terror Check / Sanction Lists

When necessary, the team at Candidate Clear provides training and consultancy services focused on the compliance and risk-minimisation aspects of recruitment. The team is essentially composed of individuals with over a decade in the background checking and compliance industries.
